function RIR_EP05_19()
    -- .エピローグ「ミナトとリラ」
    SaveData.Title = "ミナトとリラ"

    -- ///BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Daria-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hey, Minato-kun. Long time no see." ]])

    MSG([[ A few weeks after the Princess Election, I reunited with Daria-san in the hospital room where my sister Marika lies asleep. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "The Himegami family is continuing the Hermes Project. Well, they've decided to completely withdraw from Yuriai Private Academy though." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "If you know that much..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Yeah, I decided to return to the Himegami family." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "But not as an ally. I'm taking on the role of stopper to prevent anyone else from suffering misfortune caused by the Himegami family." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Because if I do, I believe the people I cherish will be happy." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying that, Daria-san gently stroked Marika's hair. Her face, touched by Daria-san, seemed to be smiling somehow. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0476.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Behind Nemesia’s ruthless actions, there seems to be the presence of an older sister who passed away long ago." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Beautiful girls are only admired for a brief moment in every era. When another beauty appears, the old generation’s beauty is forgotten." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Her older sister, Nemesia, who kept playing the idealized role until she finally lost her life, is now forgotten by everyone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "She couldn’t accept that situation and decided to eliminate other beauties with the perfect 'beauty' named Hermes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0480.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "It might be a very distorted way, but I believe it’s Nemesia’s own form of compassion." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1210.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I might understand Nemesia-san’s feelings..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Nemesia-san may have wanted to prevent the tragedy of breaking down by constantly playing an ideal, like my sister Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ However, to me, Nemesia-san herself also seemed trapped by the 'ideal' and recklessly running alone. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like how Marika is now being supported by Daria-san and beginning to show signs of recovery. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how strong a person is, they surely need someone who accepts the 'real self' and understands them. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート・春
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //SE：頭を叩く音

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1680.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ouch!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1333.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "What’s with that gloomy face?" ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM15.wav")

    -- //CG：リラEND
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV032aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ —While lost in thought over my conversation with Daria-san on the weekend, Lira-san tapped my head. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s currently lunchtime at the academy. This is precious time where I can hang out carefreely with Lira-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "L-Lira-chan! Even if the gods, Buddhas, and Enma-sama forgive you for hitting Erika-onee-sama’s head, I absolutely won’t forgive you!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Huh? I’m the most important Princess Emperor at this academy, you know? I’m allowed to hit whoever’s head I want." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1335.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "So you better take this too! Princess Emperor Slap!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuuaaaaaah!? If I’m getting hit, I want it to be from Erika-onee-sama!" ]])

    MSG([[ Soothing Hiyu-san who’s angry at Lira-san for hitting my head, I can’t help but smile at these peaceful everyday moments. ]])

    MSG([[ Since the Princess Election, Lira-san has even started appearing on TV, gaining popularity as a “makeup master.” ]])

    MSG([[ Now she’s in high demand not only at school but also on TV, and can’t go outside whether she’s without makeup or in her gal state. ]])

    MSG([[ Her greatest healing is—the time she spends with me at school like this. ]])

    MSG([[ To be her emotional support, I continue to play "Erika Ikusa" even now. ]])

    MSG([[ And though we’re officially treated as a yuri couple on campus, which puts me in a bit of an awkward spot, we’re having fun every day. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1336.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Erika, let’s go eat crepes together after school today! There’s a new shop by the station!" ]])

    MSG([[ Amidst the usual noisy academy, Lira-san secretly placed her hand on mine, smiling shyly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1681.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, I’d be happy to. I’ll go anywhere with you, Lira-san." ]])

    MSG([[ Now that she’s become an even bigger presence than my sister, I squeeze her hand in return, eager to support her.]])

    -- 21	ボク姫様と外見主義	雑草でも、花咲くことができた
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(21)

    -- 　　　　◆
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    SystemSaveData.IsClearRIR = true

    -- ゲームクリア
    GAME_CLEAR()

    ScenarioManager.Next("")
end
